Subdivision.SubDescription: We believe that beautiful homes begin with customers who want to love the home in which they live … customers who don’t want to settle for a pre-owned house that doesn’t fit their needs or taste. Our philosophy for well over 30 years has been to build a well designed, quality constructed house that is a joy to live in A house that our customers are proud to call Home.

Plan.Description: Great narrow lot house design, three bedrooms, 2 full baths and laundry room complete the spacious open-planned living room - dining room - kitchen areas. Every square foot works in this charmer. The perfect full time or vacation home geared for comfort and casual living.

Not an inch is lost in this 1,704 sq. ft. Cape Cod home. A dream kitchen connects the huge great room and the dining room. Go formal or casual. The optional garage opens to the large coat closet and half bath. Three spacious bedrooms and two bathrooms occupy the upper level.

Our multi-family plans have been designed for both the investor and owner-occupant. Each plan contains the features both renters and owner-occupants are looking for such as low maintenance, sound control, easy to work in kitchens, adequate storage, open floor plans, and most importantly pricing that helps put together a financially viable project. Each plan can be modified based on owner requirements and budget.

Our multi-family plans have been designed for both the investor and owner-occupant. Each plan contains the features both renters and owner-occupants are looking for such as low maintenance, sound control, easy to work in kitchens, adequate storage, open floor plans, and most importantly pricing that helps put together a financially viable project. Each plan can be modified based on owner requirements and budget.

This design offers interesting options with its first floor full bath: the dining room could, when desired, become a bedroom/study for an elder parent or guest quarters. The spacious great room/open kitchen is a much sought after arrangement for today's homebuyers. The second floor has a lovely master suite, two additional bedrooms and a full bath.

Look no further than this comfortable abode to find your next home. Lots of light and a well thought out floor plan add comfort to the end of your day. The kitchen/dining/living room combination adds easy flow for entertaining and offers flexible space ideas. The master bedroom has an en-suite bath with a soaker tub and separate shower, plus huge walk-in closet. Two additional bedrooms and a bath located at the other end of this home offer privacy. Add a garage or deck to expand the footprint if desired.

What a lot of living is packed into this well-planned four bedroom ranch. The attractive exterior is enhanced by tasteful attention to design details. The master suite enjoys a huge bath with both tub and shower plus a large walk-in closet. The living - dining - kitchen space is entirely open. The utility/laundry room is convenient to all the bedrooms.!

Summer Place is the perfect plan for combining the elegance of formal home with the convenience of more informal living. The Foyer and Master Bedroom are stunning and the separate Living / Dining Rooms are the perfect space for enjoying your company. This spacious home plan will welcome your family and friends and be remembered as a place where their special memories began.

This home offers three bedrooms, two baths and 1,640 square feet of living space. With the kitchen situated on the front side of the home, you can easily watch your children play in the front yard. Additionally, the home offers walk-in closets in two of the bedrooms, an open concept living/dining/kitchen area and a dedicated utility room.

Do you dream of having the prettiest house on the block? Well, here’s your chance together with an excellent floor plan on both levels. Three large bedrooms on the second floor all have walk-in closets. Two full baths up and powder room plus laundry on the main level guarantee convenience.

Our multi-family plans have been designed for both the investor and owner-occupant. Each plan contains the features both renters and owner-occupants are looking for such as low maintenance, sound control, easy to work in kitchens, adequate storage, open floor plans, and most importantly pricing that helps put together a financially viable project. Each plan can be modified based on owner requirements and budget.

Simplicity is the secret of success in the Little Compton. The welcoming great room, open kitchen, powder room and laundry occupy the main level. The master suite with optional private veranda has its own bath and large closets. Two more bedrooms and hall bath complete the second floor.

The beloved Craftsman architectural style combines winningly in this charming one-story home with its expertly designed interior that includes open-plan living plus three bedrooms, two full baths and a laundry room. The kitchen is the hub of this home and features a large island with bar seating, plus a sought-after walk-in pantry. This home is one floor living at its best.

An ideal floor plan for a wooded location, this two-story maximizes its 1,236 square feet with an open-to-above ceiling in the living room, an open kitchen/dining area and an upper loft area. Additional features include his-and-her closets and a window seat in the master bedroom.

Ideal for the first-time home buyer, this ranch style home offers 1,339 square feet of living space, three bedrooms and two baths. This home boasts several sought after features, including a large living area, an open concept kitchen/dining area, walk-in closets in two of the bedrooms and a dedicated utility area.

Looking to simplify? Shenandoah offers spacious rooms with ease of simplicity. The kitchen/dining/living area is one welcoming space while the two bedrooms off to the side offer privacy and a quiet retreat from the day.

Simple clean lines allow for easy living and entertaining. Enter into the spacious living room and into the open concept kitchen/dining room. Generously sized bedrooms flank each side of the home with a master complete with en-suite and walk-in closet. Great for guests and entertaining.

This home boasts both comfort and style with ease of one-floor living. The open floor plan of living room/dining room/kitchen makes it easy to entertain in the heart of the home. A master bedroom en-suite with soaker tub and walk-in closet comforts you at the end of the day. Two bedrooms on the other side of the home - both with ample space and walk-in closets - provide privacy for your guests.

Our multi-family plans have been designed for both the investor and owner-occupant. Each plan contains the features both renters and owner-occupants are looking for such as low maintenance, sound control, easy to work in kitchens, adequate storage, open floor plans, and most importantly pricing that helps put together a financially viable project. Each plan can be modified based on owner requirements and budget.

Our multi-family plans have been designed for both the investor and owner-occupant. Each plan contains the features both renters and owner-occupants are looking for such as low maintenance, sound control, easy to work in kitchens, adequate storage, open floor plans, and most importantly pricing that helps put together a financially viable project. Each plan can be modified based on owner requirements and budget.

This home has charm written all over it and the design makes the very most of its 1,800 square feet. The completely open living/dining, island kitchen combo gives an immediate sense of spaciousness. Two bedrooms, a full bath and laundry/mudroom area complete the first floor. The large den/study on the second floor is another important multi-purpose amenity that can be a quiet getaway area just for the owners or enjoyed by the entire family. Two full sized walk-in closets and a bath completes the stunning second floor master suite.

A close cousin to the Roxbury, this version is slightly larger, offering a walk-in closet off the master bedroom and different arrangements of its mudroom amenities. The strong appeal of its basic plan is the same.

This sweet home offers ease of living on one floor for a narrow lot. Enter from your front porch into the open concept living room/dining and kitchen. Flooded with light from the beautiful bay window alcove, this entry makes you feel right at home. Three bedrooms tucked in the back with a full master en-suite add to this simple easy floor plan.

Engineered for smaller building lots, this coastal plans features three bedrooms, two bathrooms, and 1,723 square feet of living space on the first floor. The proposed upper level allows for an additional bedroom, bathroom, loft area and another 1,056 square feet of living space. The open kitchen, dining and living area is perfect for entertaining guests, while the master suite provides the ideal retreat.

With its wealth of architectural detail this delightful home is sure to please. It is one of our most interesting and comfortable room arrangements of all our designs. Like to entertain? The Simsbury makes it easy and a pleasure for you and your guests. Fabulous chef style kitchen, dramatic great room, lovely entrance foyer, master suite with two walk-in closets and extra large bath, two additional bedrooms with full bath and a laundry are just some of the many features that make this home special.

This formidable two-story is ideal for the move-up home buyer. Featuring a foyer with an open-to-above ceiling, a formal dining room, a home office, a family room with an open-to-above family room and an open concept kitchen/nook area, the first floor has lots to offer. But wait, there is more! The second level features a large master suite, dedicated utility room and additional bedrooms. In total, this plan delivers 3,262 square feet of living space, five bedrooms and four baths.

Many large windows flood this amazing ranch with welcome light. The large, many-featured kitchen makes multi-tasking easy with the laundry room just adjacent. The dining/living room is open to the kitchen as well. Master suite and two more bedrooms with full bath are at the opposite end of the house from the master for privacy.

Looking out or looking in, this fascinating beach house captures it all. Everyone wants an open living/dining/kitchen and this charming cottage takes the prize. Massive vista doors bring in light while giving access to the outdoors... the perfect setting for relaxing or partying with friends and family.

With the Hawthorne, 1,476 square feet never looked so good! This plan includes all of todays sought after features, including a foyer entrance, an open concept living/ dining/kitchen area, walk-in closets in each of the three bedrooms and a dedicated utility room.

A built-in front porch gives way to a formal foyer entrance in this 1,501 square foot, three bedroom, two bath ranch style plan. The heart of this home is the open concept kitchen/dining/living area, which is perfect for entertaining. Other features include walk-in closets in every bedroom, a dedicated utility area and effective curb appeal.

Monroe II offers the much sought-after open plan: living, dining and kitchen (with island) all open to each other. Optional fireplace and deck on the private side will only increase the pleasure. Master suite and two additional bedrooms and bath complete the layout.!

This perfect ranch delights. Open and airy, this open concept plan with living room/dining room/kitchen great room offers sought-after space for family and friends to enjoy time together. A convenient laundry room off the kitchen offers easy living. The large-sized master bedroom with en-suite bath features a double sink vanity, shower and soaker tub as well as a walk-in closet. The two spare bedrooms on the opposite end of the home offer ample privacy for you and your guests when entertaining.

This ranch style vacation home has everything you need for a weekend away. Three bedrooms, two baths and 1,776 square feet of living space have been designed to include a large living area, dedicated utility room, a formal dining room and a large kitchen with an extended breakfast bar.

The perfect 3-bedroom home that offers ease of living. The much sought after open concept floor plan centers the heart of the home with the kitchen/living room/dining area. Bedrooms and a laundry flank each side. Add a deck off the back for added elegance.

This is the basic cape cod home style that has won the hearts of millions across America. One of it´s virtues is that add-ons and wings only increase it´s charm. Our version offers the luxury of a first floor bedroom and laundry room to its large living/dining room connected to the kitchen by a half wall. Two more bedrooms and full bath occupy the second floor.

Our multi-family plans have been designed for both the investor and owner-occupant. Each plan contains the features both renters and owner-occupants are looking for such as low maintenance, sound control, easy to work in kitchens, adequate storage, open floor plans, and most importantly pricing that helps put together a financially viable project. Each plan can be modified based on owner requirements and budget.

Boasting walk-in closets in each of its three bedrooms, two full baths and 1,421 square feet of living space, this ranch style home also offers an extremely open kitchen/dining/living area and a dedicated utility room.

The charming 3-bedroom ranch has everything you need on one floor and is the perfect plan for a narrow building site. Enter the dining room/kitchen/living room great room and find an island for easy entertaining. Three bedrooms off to the other side - including the master with en-suite complete this comfortable home.

A standout on any street, the Waterford´s excellent layout separates the master bedroom and full bath from the other two bedrooms (which share a full bath). The kitchen has everything you want: a peninsula is open to the dining room for convenient serving, the laundry is enclosed for privacy, ample counter space, walk-in pantry and rear door to future deck or terrace.

Our multi-family plans have been designed for both the investor and owner-occupant. Each plan contains the features both renters and owner-occupants are looking for such as low maintenance, sound control, easy to work in kitchens, adequate storage, open floor plans, and most importantly pricing that helps put together a financially viable project. Each plan can be modified based on owner requirements and budget.

The Block Island offers a knockout design for a four-bedroom house. In addition to the great room, dining room and up-to-the minute kitchen, the first floor has a multi-purpose den/study, perfect for the home careerist, or guests. A fantastic option for now or later is the wraparound porch providing cover from the optional garage.

Our multi-family plans have been designed for both the investor and owner-occupant. Each plan contains the features both renters and owner-occupants are looking for such as low maintenance, sound control, easy to work in kitchens, adequate storage, open floor plans, and most importantly pricing that helps put together a financially viable project. Each plan can be modified based on owner requirements and budget.

Be ready for that dream summer. With all the charm of colonial style, this beauty is totally beach-savvy. Meeting the highest standards of structural strength, it boasts 6 bedrooms, 4 full baths, laundry room, sunroom and a fabulous living-dining-kitchen open design.

Our multi-family plans have been designed for both the investor and owner-occupant. Each plan contains the features both renters and owner-occupants are looking for such as low maintenance, sound control, easy to work in kitchens, adequate storage, open floor plans, and most importantly pricing that helps put together a financially viable project. Each plan can be modified based on owner requirements and budget.

Two bedrooms, two baths and 1,558 square feet of available living space makes this cottage plan suitable for a lake side vacation home. A front porch and foyer makes a welcoming entrance, the ample kitchen space with a raised bar opens to the dining area and a large living room. A significant master suite completes this comfortable and casual home.

Our multi-family plans have been designed for both the investor and owner-occupant. Each plan contains the features both renters and owner-occupants are looking for such as low maintenance, sound control, easy to work in kitchens, adequate storage, open floor plans, and most importantly pricing that helps put together a financially viable project. Each plan can be modified based on owner requirements and budget.

Our multi-family plans have been designed for both the investor and owner-occupant. Each plan contains the features both renters and owner-occupants are looking for such as low maintenance, sound control, easy to work in kitchens, adequate storage, open floor plans, and most importantly pricing that helps put together a financially viable project. Each plan can be modified based on owner requirements and budget.

Looking for a lot of house less than 1,800 square feet? Look no further. In addition to it's attractive exterior, it offers the much wanted open living room, dining area and kitchen. The bedroom wing has a master suite with walk-in closet and private bath. Two additional baths and laundry room are ideally located. For those who prefer a little extra space, the optional mudroom with walk-in pantry and huge coat closet can be added.
The traditional design meets the modern family's lifestyle. Large combination rooms provide flexible open spaces for plenty of together time while the elegant master suite offers a welcome retreat.

Our multi-family plans have been designed for both the investor and owner-occupant. Each plan contains the features both renters and owner-occupants are looking for such as low maintenance, sound control, easy to work in kitchens, adequate storage, open floor plans, and most importantly pricing that helps put together a financially viable project. Each plan can be modified based on owner requirements and budget.

Just try and find a more desirable ranch than the Ellington. Beautiful inside and out, one floor living could not be more ideally planned. Open design is the rule with the knockout kitchen and spacious great room. There are two bedrooms with full bath at one end of the house and a very private master suite with large walk-in closet and bath at the other. Optional features include porch, deck and garage.!

It's not just curb appeal that sets this three-bedroom ranch apart. Perfect for family and casual entertaining, the fully - equipped kitchen has an island with raised bar and is wide open to the great room / dining area. The large master bedroom has a private bath. Two additional bedrooms share a second full bath. A three-season room is a popular option with this home.

The Woodland features our popular open cooking-dining-gathering area with a real "wow" effect of a true-vault ceiling. Large double doors and custom contemporary glass compliment the great room and provide great view opportunities.

Our multi-family plans have been designed for both the investor and owner-occupant. Each plan contains the features both renters and owner-occupants are looking for such as low maintenance, sound control, easy to work in kitchens, adequate storage, open floor plans, and most importantly pricing that helps put together a financially viable project. Each plan can be modified based on owner requirements and budget.

Here is a 2-story charmer with affinity for the beach. For those who love a traditional appearance but want the convenient, free and easy interior most appropriate for family fun and entertaining at the shore, the Matunuck I is a winner. A spacious kitchen opens to the great room plus easy access to the first floor bath with roomy shower. The large kitchen island with its raised bar is another plus. A master suite, additional bedroom, hall bath and loft complete the second floor.

Your taste for contemporary will find its answer here. The first floor features a 14’ x 20’ great room with vaulted ceiling and optional fireplace and deck. It is open to a spacious kitchen with an island/bar. Two bedrooms and laundry complete the lower level. The second floor is devoted to a luxurious master suite with a loft overlooking the great room.

Boasting and open and airy great room, the Mt. Laurelle two-story takes advantage of natural light and offers a bed/bath on the 1st floor. It total, the home delivers three bedrooms, three baths and 2,186 square feet of living space.

This unique design has all of the spaces needed in a home. Gatherings will be natural given the spacious, open living areas but getting away is also made easy with a Master Suite opening to a large full width back porch (optional) on the view side of the home. Guests, too, will be able to get away from it all with bedrooms that are more secluded from the gathering areas. Everyone will enjoy the outdoor living areas made possible with (optional) front and rear porches.

The Bayville II is a quaint coastal home which packs all of the essentials into a 1,253 square foot package. The home delivers three bedrooms and two bathrooms and offers several on-site porch and deck configurations.

Shawnee, simple and unassuming, has deceptively large open spaces. Enter into your foyer and see clear through to the backyard through the ample living room/dining room/kitchen. Three bedrooms to the side of the house offer the master of the house privacy and a full walk-in closet and en-suite bath. The two additional bedrooms of ample size share a full bath.

A narrow lot? Here's your answer: all your needs and wants are satisfied in this three bedroom, 2 full baths winner with pretty front porch. This very open floor plan has a peninsula kitchen with bar overlooking the dining and living rooms. The sliding glass door and loads of windows provide abundant natural light.

Here is that hard-to-find perfect house for a narrow lot! This two bedroom, open plan home with charming front porch, large island in the modern kitchen and charming walk-in bay window in the great room has amenity to burn.

Yet another nifty design for a narrow lot. The Windham charms with its cute front porch and L-shaped living - dining - kitchen open plan. An optional deck may be located to the side. Everyone wants a kitchen island and this one is large with seating on two sides, three bedrooms, 2 full baths and lots of closets complete.

A great plan and charming gabled exterior characterizes this attractive ranch. The “great room” concept of the living room, dining room and large island kitchen is perfect for casual living and entertaining. The three-bedroom, two full bath wing includes the luxury of a laundry room. Give this appealing home a close study.

Here is a 2-story charmer with affinity for the beach. For those who love a traditional appearance but want the convenient, free and easy interior most appropriate for family fun and entertaining at the shore, the Matunuck II is a winner. This open concept plan features a spacious kitchen with a large raised bar island and a great room. The first floor laundry with additional storage and half bath are conveniently located. A master suite, plus two additional bedrooms and a bath complete the second floor.

This coastal Cape Cod plan features an extremely open first level and 12/12 roof pitch for added space in the proposed upper level. With plenty of on-site porch and deck possibilities, this two bedroom, two bathroom, 2,700 square foot home has the potential to satisfy your every need.
